Action.author: ozheregelya
Action.body: ~SeanBohan_Sovrin , I'm not sure about it, because I get this problem first time with less than 5000 transactions in ledger.

Action.author: anikitindsr
Action.body: As of now, all of our storages are Rocksdb by default and read_ledger does not making copy of requested ledger but only open storage in reqd_only mode. Therefore, i think this issue is not actual for now.
